com.ftdichip.ftd2xx.ui
Interface DeviceInformationViewer

All Known Implementing Classes:
DeviceDescriptorViewer, EEPROMViewer, TerminalPanel
public interface DeviceInformationViewer

Interface for viewers that display Device dependent information.

Author:
Mike Werner

Method Summary
 void clear()
          Clears the viewer's contents.
 void update(Device device)
          Updates the viewers particular information.
 

Method Detail

update

void update(Device device)
            throws FTD2xxException
Updates the viewers particular information.

Parameters:
device - the device for which to show the information.
Throws:
FTD2xxException - if the viewer can not retrieve the particular information from the device.

clear

void clear()
Clears the viewer's contents.
